name: A Shot in the Dark (tvtyler)
description:
MUST BE PLAYED IN FULL SCREEN

HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED

by Tyler Valdis Zudans

WASD - Movement

L-Click - Damage Spell

R-Click - Clear Fog Spell

L-Shift - Sprint

You appear suddenly in a plain room all alone. Alone excluding an oddly shaped creature caged beside you, that is. A voice begins to give instructions. Soon you a whisked away to a place where your eyes deceive you, and only by listening, and brief flashes from your wand into the forest, can you gain sight into your surroundings. Be careful to use your power wisely as it is limited. Best of luck surviving your journey.

Built in under 48 hours for the 2019 Grapefruit Game Jam #2. Theme: Mind Experiment - Play Without Sight

Special Thanks to Val, Zane, and Zeo Zudans for voicing my creatures and creating the music. Additional thanks to my mom for letting me use her computer, and Gwyn for giving advice for the game.
